ğŸš€ This week, several new items have been added to enhance the experience of simulating life as an airline pilot. You can now fly as an Avianca or Korean Air pilot, or take to the skies in an A310 with Pan Am, Delta, or Lufthansa liveries. Additionally, Atmospheric Weather FX has been introduced. If you're on Facebook, you might have seen people sharing incredible screenshots created using the weather presets included in this package.
